N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 4243.23 - Terms and conditions

State Regulations
(a) This
type of program assistance will generally not be less than $100,000 and shall
generally not exceed the lesser of 50 percent of total project costs or
$500,000. (b) Generally, loans shall
be between 40 percent and 50 percent of the assistance and grants may provide
the balance of the assistance based on the extent to which the community in
which the project is located is a distressed area. (c) Grants for preliminary planning will
generally not be less than $25,000 or greater than $100,000 and shall generally
not exceed 50 percent of total project planning costs. (d) The foregoing terms and conditions are in
addition to the applicable general terms and conditions set forth in section
4243.4
of this

Part. Notes
